Posted By: bcornell
For sale: C46 John Ganzel, Mgr. Rochester, SGC 40 - $55 ppd.  Very nice card that got a VG grade due to an upper right corner crease.  Any form of payment is okay.  [URL="bill@t207.com"]Email me[/URL] if interested.  Thanks.

Bill

Card is for sale again, as the first buyer reneged.  I'll be glad to share his name with anyone who wants it.


Bill
